House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00545
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A SPORTS COMPLEX KNOWN AS THE "NATIONAL SPORTS TRAINING CENTER", AND PROVIDING FUNDS FOR THE ACQUISITION OF PROPERTY, CONSTRUCTION OF FACILITIES, INCLUDING ADMINISTRATION, MAINTENANCE, AND MANAGEMENT OF THE SAME
SHORT TITLE : National Sports Training Center Act
ABSTRACT : Promotes physical education and encourages sports programs, league competitions, and amateur sports, including training for international competitions, to foster self-discipline, team work, and excellence for the development of healthy and alert citizenry.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAMBAR, MARK AERON H.
